snippet.title: [Level 1 Stats] Valkyria Chronicles 3 E2 - Extra Missions: What Lurks in the Desert - 4 Turns
snippet.description:
Mission Name: What Lurks in the Desert
Mission Objectives: Escort APC reaches target area
Restrictions: None
Grade: ★★★★★
Ace Name: Yaba the Rowdy
Ace Drop 1: Orden
Ace Drop 2: None
Ranking: S: 5 | A: 6 | B: 7 | C: 20

This is a DLC mission that is not included in the "E2" version of Valkyria Chronicles 3 and therefore, entirely in Japanese. Translations may not be 100% accurate but it is at least something to go off.

--------------------
